statements: SELECT * FROM project_budgets;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_budgets WHERE total_budget > 10000;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM project_budgets ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_budgets WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT project_id, project_name, total_budget FROM project_budgets WHERE total_budget < 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM project_budgets WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM project_budgets WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_budgets WHERE total_budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY total_budget ASC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(total_budget) AS total_spent FROM project_budgets GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_spent > 20000;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM project_budgets WHERE project_name LIKE '%t%' ORDER BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM ProjectBudgetAllocations
SELECT project_id, allocation_amount FROM ProjectBudgetAllocations ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT project_id, allocation_amount, allocated_date FROM ProjectBudgetAllocations WHERE allocation_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM ProjectExpenses WHERE expense_type = 'Travel'
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM ProjectExpenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_expenses > 5000
SELECT * FROM ProjectBudgetAllocations
SELECT project_id, allocation_amount FROM ProjectBudgetAllocations ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT * FROM ProjectExpenses WHERE expense_type LIKE 'Travel'
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM ProjectExpenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_expenses > 1000
SELECT project_id, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense_amount FROM ProjectExpenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY project_id
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, category, amount FROM allocations WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects p JOIN expenses e ON p.id = e.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT p.project_name, a.category, e.date FROM projects p JOIN allocations a ON p.id = a.project_id JOIN expenses e ON p.id = e.project_id WHERE e.amount > 1000;
SELECT p.project_name, e.date, e.amount FROM projects p LEFT JOIN expenses e ON p.id = e.project_id WHERE e.date >= '2021-06-01' AND e.date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY e.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM projects WHERE project_budget > 10000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_name, total_budget, remaining_budget FROM financial_summary WHERE remaining_budget < 0;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM projects WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(allocation_amount) AS total_allocation FROM projects p JOIN allocations a ON p.project_id = a.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, total_budget, total_expenses, remaining_budget FROM financial_summary ORDER BY total_budget DESC, total_expenses ASC;
SELECT project_name, allocation_date, allocation_amount FROM projects p JOIN allocations a ON p.project_id = a.project_id WHERE allocation_amount > 5000 ORDER BY allocation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT p.project_name, e.amount, e.expense_date FROM projects p JOIN expenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id WHERE e.amount > 5000 ORDER BY e.amount DESC;
